level.heading: Legislative History of Law 12-104
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 12-104, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 2-308.07.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 19-21
level.text: For history of Law 19-21, see notes under § 2-351.15.

level.heading: Short Title
level.text: Short title: Section 1061 of D.C. Law 19-21 provided that subtitle F of title I of the act may be cited as "OIG Auditing Reform Amendment Act of 2011".

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Section 98(a) of D.C. Law 19-171 amended D.C. Law 19-21, § 9004(b) to repeal D.C. Law 6-85, § 820 instead of D.C. Law 6-85, § 816.
